column1: Hello,I have an airline ticket from the US to Georgia on Qatar Airways. Currently Qatar is closed, who knows what the situation will be in October. I wonder - if I just fly through the Doha airport without leaving it - is it still considered that I enter the country, and I'm a subject to quarantine? Or this doesn't apply to transit passengers?Thank you.

You gotta keep the faith...country is reopening to tourists from 1 aug,albeit lin a limited capacity. Read on for further info;https://covid19.moph.gov.qa/EN/Pages/Countri…https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2020/07/tests…Its good news though, normality returning step by step, hopeful of visiting in Nov :-)
For transit they never closed since they he COVID-19 started.
